name: arch::irq::chip::ioapic::IoApicAccess::new

io::io_mem::allocator::IoMemAllocatorBui.doc:
Reserves `range` from the allocator for sensitive MMIO with the specified cache policy.

 # Panics

 This function will panic if the specified range is not available.

doc:
# Safety

 The caller must ensure that the base address is a valid I/O APIC base address.
